#For general users

"Mixed Race Lit" is an online database of Chinese-language fictions and films that have mixed-race characters and about multiraciality. The aim of this database is to engage community members and educators by providing directory of textual resources. This is a space for supporting ethnic minorities and under-represented people groups, as well as raising awareness in the monoracial general public. 


##For literary scholars and other researchers

"Mixed Race Lit" provides academic and pedagogical support, and facilitates research and syllabus development. 


### About the developer

"Mixed Race Lit" is developed by Vanessa Wong, PhD candidate at East Asian Studies Department at Univeristy of California, Irvine.
